repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: A humor circular from the ILR School entitled "A Dictionary of (ILR) Occupational Titles, For the Private Use of Professor Martin P. Catherwood," February 1959.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a humor circular from the ILR School entitled "A Dictionary of (ILR) Occupational Titles, For the Private Use of Professor Martin P. Catherwood," February 1959.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ILR School Humor #/4126m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
